author: Ted Byrne
content:
Canti Rubati is as close as I can find on iTunes. Darn. I gotta tell ya... opera is NOT a taste I've aquired. I have enjoyed a pretty album by a gal named Summer who sings like an angel. But I was able to sample her sound on iTunes before pulling out the credit card. This collection of Gioielli Rubati... They come with your guarantee? Hmmmmm.... lemme think on it. Oh... the image? It rocks!

Ted
